full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender details:

* **Title**: Aircraft Towbar
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01006232
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237329/A
* **Publication Date**: September 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2022, at 14:00:00

### Tender Description:

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of Aircraft Towbar (GSIN: 1730, NSN: 01-353-0762, Part No.: 8578-5A, NCAGE: 94861) to be delivered to Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal by November 30, 2022. The requirement is for 2 units.

### Selection Criteria:

* Bidders must indicate whether they are proposing an equivalent or substitute product.
* Brand name, model, and NCAGE must be provided.

### Tendering Method:

This tender is being solicited through a request for proposals (RFP) - Competitive, Open Bidding.

### Notice Type:

This is a request for proposal.

### Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:

* Worldwide

### Contact Information:

* Danny Lebel, dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca

### Notice URL:

Not Available

### Attachments:

Please find the bid solicitation documents at the following links:

[English Version] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/06/3357fb354ffc7e7b318565e7b3f68087/w8485-237329a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf
[English Amendment 1] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/0a762975820b7af88b41b6f16b362d78/w8485-237329a_bid_solicitation_amd_001_en.pdf
[English Amendment 2] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/
